org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.common

类 HadoopInputFormatCommonBase<T,SPITTYPE extends InputSplit>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<T,SPITTYPE>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.common.HadoopInputFormatCommonBase<T,SPITTYPE>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputFormat<T,SPITTYPE>, InputSplitSource<SPITTYPE>
    直接已知子类:
    HadoopInputFormatBase, HadoopInputFormatBase

    @Internal
public abstract class HadoopInputFormatCommonBase<T,SPITTYPE extends InputSplit>
extends RichInputFormat<T,SPITTYPE>
    A common base for both "mapred" and "mapreduce" Hadoop input formats.

      • getCredentialsFromUGI

        public static org.apache.hadoop.security.Credentials getCredentialsFromUGI(org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation ugi)
        This method only exists because there is no UserGroupInformation.getCredentials() method in Hadoop 1.x

        Note that this method returns "null" in Hadoop 1.x environments.

        参数:
        ugi - The user information
        返回:
        new credentials object from the user information. MAY RETURN NULL!
